original_text: “‘When the prince provides a freewill offering to the Lord—whether a burnt offering or fellowship offerings—the gate facing east is to be opened for him. He shall offer his burnt offering or his fellowship offerings as he does on the Sabbath day. Then he shall go out, and after he has gone out, the gate will be shut.
korean_text: 만일 군주가 자원하여 번제를 준비하거나 혹은 자원하여 감사제를 준비하여 나 여호와께 드릴 때에는 그를 위하여 동쪽을 향한 문을 열고 그가 번제와 감사제를 안식일에 드림 같이 드리고 밖으로 나갈지며 나간 후에 문을 닫을지니라

sentences.original_text: When the prince provides a freewill offering to the Lord
whether a burnt offering or fellowship offerings
the gate facing east is to be opened for him
sentences.korean_translation: 동을 향한 문을 그를 위하여 열어야 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: He shall offer his burnt offering or his fellowship offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기의 번제나 자기의 화목제물을 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: as he does on the Sabbath day
sentences.korean_translation: 안식일에 하는 것 같이 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and after he has gone out
